edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol

Interface SigmaProverComputation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SigmaANDProverComputation, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaDHExtendedProverComputation, SigmaDHExtendedStatisticalProverComputation, SigmaDHProverComputation, SigmaDJEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroProverComputation, SigmaDJKnowledgeProverComputation, SigmaDJProductProverComputation, SigmaDlogProverComputation, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeProverComputation, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProverComputation, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyProverComputation, SigmaORMultipleProverComputation, SigmaORTwoProverComputation, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeProverComputation, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProverComputation

    public interface SigmaProverComputation
    This interface manages the mathematical calculations of the prover side in the sigma protocol.

    It samples random values and computes the messages.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Computes the first message of the sigma protocol.
      SigmaProtocolMsg computeSecondMsg(byte[] challenge)
      Computes the second message of the sigma protocol.
      SigmaSimulator getSimulator()
      Returns the simulator that matches this sigma protocol prover.
      int getSoundnessParam()
      Returns the soundness parameter for this Sigma protocol.
